text: Aaishi 001. Mujhe exactly yaad nahi kaise pehli baar mille the but uske baad saath hi the. Bahut philosophical baate karta hai tu, tab toh psychology ka course kar rha tha isiliye. Aur uske baad exam ke time pe library mein kam aur ccd mein zyaada baithna. Exams ke beech mein tennis khelna. Lucknow ka trip. Last antaragni mein kurte pehenke nikale the. Rooftop pe discussions. Late night chaupathi jaana, Ishu har baar rota tha par aajaata tha. Aur tera hindi aur English bolne ka unique tareeka humesha funny lagega. Obhiously tu life mein chaapega aur bahut saare trips pe chalenge bullet pe.
author: Satyam  Ralhan

text: Aur chotu, bhai college shuuru bhi tere saath hua aur khatam bhi. Mini militia ke naam nahi bhuulunga aur screenshots toh ab tak hai. Tu mere se milne nahi aata ya main tere se milne nahi aata yahi chalta tha humara ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. Mast aadmi hai tu, sab karleta hai aur confidence tagda hai tera, height ke hisaab se kuch zyaada hi hai. Tezz bhaagta hai tu saale ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. College khatam hone se pehle ek bakchod sa trip maar hi liya bhai. Waapas campus aane ke baad toh din mein 5 5 sports khelna, regular gym bhi jaane lag gaye the, induction waali maggi ka pyaar bahut mast experiences rahe hai. Not sad because it ended but happy because it happened jaisa tu bolta tha. More trips to come bro.
author: Satyam  Ralhan
